It works by first retrieving relevant documents or passages from a large corpus of documents by using a retrieval step, and then feeds these passages along with the original query into a large language model (LLM) to generate a response. RAG is one of the most commonly used techniques that are used in production AI workloads. It is used in various ways, such as in question-answering systems, chatbots, and digital workers.
